thought: To craft purple_concrete_powder, I need to place 4 sand and 4 gravel in a 2x2 square pattern, along with 1 purple_dye in the center. The purple dye is already in the crafting grid, so I will start by moving the sand to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
